name: Soul Catcher (itch) (Rainman Studios)
description:
Soul Catcher is a 2D game where you can split your soul with your body. You have to faced your enemy by dashing to your separate soul and save the hostages.
Controls 

  • WASD to walk
  • Left click to separate/callback your soul
  • Right click to dash to your soul

Disclaimer: This game is still in very early phase, so expect lots of jankiness :'D
